name: Shinden
description: A dimension of ancient traditions, shadow clans, and deadly honor. Cherry blossoms fall over blood-stained dojos as warriors seek enlightenment through combat.

atmosphere.visual: Purple mists, bamboo forests, traditional architecture
atmosphere.danger: Shadow assassins, corrupted spirits, political intrigue

charles.name: Ronin Charles
charles.title: The Shepherd in Exile
charles.description: A masterless warrior who found purpose in protecting Nikes. His discipline masks deep sorrow.
charles.backstory: Once served a great lord before discovering the corruption of the Shadow Clan. Now wanders alone, helping those he finds.

legendaryNike.name: Ninja Nike
legendaryNike.title: The Shadow That Sees All Futures
legendaryNike.description: Master of shadow arts, able to perceive possible futures. Corrupted by Nolem's whispers of isolation.
legendaryNike.corruptionReason: The loneliness of seeing futures where everyone he loves dies
legendaryNike.freedBy: Showing him futures where connection survives

harbinger.name: Yuki
harbinger.title: The Ice Shadow
harbinger.description: Once loved a Nike completely. When that Nike died, her grief became rage, then service to Nolem.

locations.name: The Veil
locations.description: The dimensional barrier, appearing as an endless wall of mist

locations.name: Dojo Entrance
locations.description: Training grounds where warriors first learn the ways of Shinden

locations.name: Bamboo Forest
locations.description: Endless green stalks that whisper secrets to those who listen

locations.name: Ronin's Camp
locations.description: Where Ronin Charles shelters those fleeing the Shadow Clan

locations.name: Shadow Temple
locations.description: The corrupted heart of the Shadow Clan's power

locations.name: Midnight Gardens
locations.description: Where Ninja Nike waits, seeing all possible futures

factions.name: The Ronin
factions.description: Masterless warriors who resist the Shadow Clan

factions.name: The Temple Monks
factions.description: Keepers of ancient wisdom, wary of outsiders

dimensionalAnchor.name: Shadow Kunai
dimensionalAnchor.description: A blade that exists in shadow and light simultaneously

ogForeshadowing.quote: Their bond was so strong that when reality fractured, it echoed across every dimension instead of breaking.
